name: Clear Rock Quartz Ring, Minimalism, Brass Ring, Statement Piece
description:
Hand-crafted from scratch, every piece is made with lots of love.

Carefully shaped clear rock quartz set atop polished yellow brass is purposefully made to suit almost every occasion. 
...............................................................................................................................................................................

MYSTICAL CRYSTAL

Quartz so daringly plucked from the mythical fire-breathing dragon's lair. Legend has it that anyone who comes in possession of the magical stone will experience eternal youth. Good for cocktail parties and afternoon picnics, doesn't shout nor hustle, just compliments perfectly. This is where minimalism meets sophistication and everybody else, all embodied on a very elegant piece of quartz atop a ring.
...............................................................................................................................................................................

Approx. item measurements:
clear rock quartz: 10mm across the base (cone-shaped)
height: 2.1cm
width: 1.5cm

*Size is customizable, just leave a note upon checkout!
...............................................................................................................................................................................

Comes with a super awesome Booge box, which makes for a super awesome gift.
...............................................................................................................................................................................

name: Beaded Fashion Bracelet, Pewter Feather Charm, Stretchable, Street
description:
6mm Howlite/Hematite Beads. Chrome Parts. Pewter Feather (White/Silver)

THE FEATHERED CHIMPANZEE

We actually went to great lengths to get this very exquisite piece for you guys. Firstly, the feather ain't no ordinary feather, it's actually harvested from the mystical fire-breathing half-bird-half-chimpanzee creature living in the deep jungles of Jamaica. Residual magical powers might be present in feather, keep in cage when not in use, bracelet flight might occur.
​
...............................................................................................................................................................................

Approx. item measurements:
bracelet length: 6 1/2"
Beads' width: 0.6cm

*Bracelet is 6.5" which fits most wrists. It is made with elastic stretch cord and expands to fit over your hand and snaps back into place for a perfect fit. If you need a different length, please specify when ordering. Please measure your wrist with a tape measure and send it in the notes to seller.

Size is customizable, just leave a note upon checkout!
...............................................................................................................................................................................

Comes with a super awesome Booge box, which makes for a super awesome gift.
...............................................................................................................................................................................

name: Beaded Fashion Bracelet,Brass Skull, Lapis Lazuli Beads
description:
12mm Lapis Lazuli Beads. Chrome Parts. Brass Skull (Blue/Brass Skull)

SKULL OF AL CAPONE"

With the modern day mafia in mind, we present to you (read with deep theatrical voice)... the skull of Al Capone beaded beads bracelet series. Designed with extra fierceness and awesomeness, it will accompany you through the toughest of street fights, territorial cliams, money laundering operations and everything illegal. Use at your own risk! (Individual item description can be found upon mouse rollover)

name: Stretchable Beads Bracelet with French Lily Charm
description:
6mm Tiger Eye Beads. Chrome Parts. Pewter French Lily (Yellow, Tiger Eye)


FRENCH MILLY DILLY LILY

Use in times of incredible desperation and for instant inclusion into royaltiness. Wear the bracelet for shopping discounts/vip access to clubs and everything else exclusive and good. We present to you the fleur de lis, the ultimate symbol of swagger once reserved only for french royalty, made accesible to the everyone in the form of this beaded beads bracelet.
